灛字的基本解释

灛
chǎn
古河名，汶水支流，在今中国山东省宁阳县。

灛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》昌善切，上獮，昌。］
汶水支流。在今山东省宁阳县东北。一说本作“闡”。

灛字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灛； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页663第31
【廣韻】昌善切【集韻】齒善切，?育闡。水名。【爾雅·釋水】汶爲灛。【註】大水溢出別爲小水之名。

灛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
灛字的起名意思

暂无。

灛
Basic explanation of words
灛
chǎn
The name of the ancient river, a tributary of Wenshui, is in Ningyang County, Shandong Province, China.
灛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎn］
["Guangyun" Chang Shan cuts, up and down, Chang. ]
Wenshui tributary. In today's northeast of Ningyang County, Shandong Province. One talk about the "explanation" of this work.
灛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first chapter of the collection】【The Department of Water Characters】　灛; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 663 31
[Guang Yun] Chang Shan Cut [Ji Yun] The teeth are good at cutting, and they are educated. Water name. 【Erya·Shishui】Wen Weiwei. [Note] The overflow of big water is not the name of small water.
